meanings.sent1: The telco installed new phone lines in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: I called the telco to report my internet outage.
meanings.sent3: Why did the telco break up with the internet? They just couldn't connect.
meanings.sent4: The telco is the lifeline of communication in our modern world.
meanings.sent5: The telco's logo is as recognizable as the sun in the sky.

meanings.sent1: She pursued a career in telco technology.
meanings.sent2: The telco industry is constantly evolving with new advancements.
meanings.sent3: The telco signal danced through the airwaves with grace.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a telco network, connecting ideas seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The telco equipment hummed softly, keeping the world connected.
